subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The overall leader Igor Antón was forced to abandon the Vuelta a España after a crash near the end of the mountainous 14th stage, which was won by Joaquín Rodríguez of Spain on Saturday.
snippet: The overall leader Igor Antón was forced to abandon the Vuelta a España after a crash near the end of the mountainous 14th stage, which was won by Joaquín Rodríguez of Spain on Saturday.
